TestCase.name: testCanPushDownWithGroup
TestCase.Resource: SELECT min(id), max(amount), sum(price), avg(price), count(1), name FROM MyTable group by name

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2], EXPR$2=[$3], EXPR$3=[$4], EXPR$4=[$5], name=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[MIN($1)], EXPR$1=[MAX($2)], EXPR$2=[SUM($3)], EXPR$3=[AVG($3)], EXPR$4=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3], $f4=[1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3, EXPR$4, name]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[name], select=[name, Final_MIN(min$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_MAX(max$1) AS EXPR$1, Final_SUM(sum$2) AS EXPR$2, Final_AVG(sum$3, count$4) AS EXPR$3, Final_COUNT(count1$5) AS EXPR$4]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[true], groupSet=[name], aggregators=[(aggFunc: LongMinAggFunction, argNames: id) (aggFunc: IntMaxAggFunction, argNames: amount) (aggFunc: DoubleSumAggFunction, argNames: price) (aggFunc: DoubleSum0AggFunction, argNames: price) (aggFunc: CountAggFunction, argNames: price) (aggFunc: Count1AggFunction, argNames: )], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `min$0` BIGINT, `max$1` INT, `sum$2` DOUBLE, `sum$3` DOUBLE, `count$4` BIGINT, `count1$5` BIGINT> NOT NULL]]]], fields=[name, min$0, max$1, sum$2, sum$3, count$4, count1$5])

TestCase.name: testCanPushDownWithoutGroup
TestCase.Resource: SELECT min(id), max(amount), max(name), sum(price), avg(price), count(id) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MIN($0)], EXPR$1=[MAX($1)], EXPR$2=[MAX($2)], EXPR$3=[SUM($3)], EXPR$4=[AVG($3)], EXPR$5=[COUNT($0)]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$1], amount=[$2], name=[$0], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]])

SortAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_MIN(min$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_MAX(max$1) AS EXPR$1, Final_MAX(max$2) AS EXPR$2, Final_SUM(sum$3) AS EXPR$3, Final_AVG(sum$4, count$5) AS EXPR$4, Final_COUNT(count$6) AS EXPR$5]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[true], groupSet=[], aggregators=[(aggFunc: LongMinAggFunction, argNames: id) (aggFunc: IntMaxAggFunction, argNames: amount) (aggFunc: StringMaxAggFunction, argNames: name) (aggFunc: DoubleSumAggFunction, argNames: price) (aggFunc: DoubleSum0AggFunction, argNames: price) (aggFunc: CountAggFunction, argNames: price) (aggFunc: CountAggFunction, argNames: id)], producedDataType=[ROW<`min$0` BIGINT, `max$1` INT, `max$2` STRING, `sum$3` DOUBLE, `sum$4` DOUBLE, `count$5` BIGINT, `count$6` BIGINT> NOT NULL]]]], fields=[min$0, max$1, max$2, sum$3, sum$4, count$5, count$6])

TestCase.name: testCannotPushDownWithColumnExpression
TestCase.Resource: SELECT min(amount + price), max(amount), sum(price), count(id), name FROM MyTable group by name

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2], EXPR$2=[$3], EXPR$3=[$4], name=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[MIN($1)], EXPR$1=[MAX($2)], EXPR$2=[SUM($3)], EXPR$3=[COUNT($4)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], $f1=[+($2, $3)], amount=[$2], price=[$3], id=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3, name]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[name], select=[name, Final_MIN(min$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_MAX(max$1) AS EXPR$1, Final_SUM(sum$2) AS EXPR$2, Final_COUNT(count$3) AS EXPR$3]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[name], select=[name, Partial_MIN($f1) AS min$0, Partial_MAX(amount) AS max$1, Partial_SUM(price) AS sum$2, Partial_COUNT(id) AS count$3]) +- Calc(select=[name, +(amount, price) AS $f1, amount, price, id]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])

TestCase.name: testCannotPushDownWithUnsupportedAggFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT min(id), max(amount), sum(price), count(distinct id), name FROM MyTable group by name

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2], EXPR$2=[$3], EXPR$3=[$4], name=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[MIN($1)], EXPR$1=[MAX($2)], EXPR$2=[SUM($3)], EXPR$3=[COUNT(DISTINCT $1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3, name]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[name], select=[name, Final_MIN(min$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_MIN(min$1) AS EXPR$1, Final_MIN(min$2) AS EXPR$2, Final_COUNT(count$3) AS EXPR$3]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[name], select=[name, Partial_MIN(EXPR$0) FILTER $g_1 AS min$0, Partial_MIN(EXPR$1) FILTER $g_1 AS min$1, Partial_MIN(EXPR$2) FILTER $g_1 AS min$2, Partial_COUNT(id) FILTER $g_0 AS count$3]) +- Calc(select=[name, id, EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 1) AS $g_1]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[name, id, $e], select=[name, id, $e, Final_MIN(min$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_MAX(max$1) AS EXPR$1, Final_SUM(sum$2) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name, id, $e]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[name, id, $e], select=[name, id, $e, Partial_MIN(id_0) AS min$0, Partial_MAX(amount) AS max$1, Partial_SUM(price) AS sum$2]) +- Expand(projects=[name, id, amount, price, $e, id_0], projects=[{name, id, amount, price, 0 AS $e, id AS id_0}, {name, null AS id, amount, price, 1 AS $e, id AS id_0}]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])

TestCase.name: testCannotPushDownWithWindowAggFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, amount, sum(price) over (partition by name), name FROM MyTable

LogicalProject(id=[$1], amount=[$2], EXPR$2=[CASE(>(COUNT($3) OVER (PARTITION BY $0 RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING), 0), $SUM0($3) OVER (PARTITION BY $0 RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING), null:DOUBLE)], name=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]])

Calc(select=[id, amount, CASE(>(w0$o0, 0:BIGINT), w0$o1, null:DOUBLE) AS EXPR$2, name]) +- OverAggregate(partitionBy=[name], window#0=[COUNT(price) AS w0$o0, $SUM0(price) AS w0$o1 RANG BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING], select=[name, id, amount, price, w0$o0, w0$o1]) +- Sort(orderBy=[name ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])

TestCase.name: testCannotPushDownWithPredicates
TestCase.Resource: SELECT min(id), max(amount), sum(price), count(id), name FROM MyTable WHERE id > 100 group by name

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2], EXPR$2=[$3], EXPR$3=[$4], name=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[MIN($1)], EXPR$1=[MAX($2)], EXPR$2=[SUM($3)], EXPR$3=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 100)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3, name]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[name], select=[name, Final_MIN(min$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_MAX(max$1) AS EXPR$1, Final_SUM(sum$2) AS EXPR$2, Final_COUNT(count$3) AS EXPR$3]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[name], select=[name, Partial_MIN(id) AS min$0, Partial_MAX(amount) AS max$1, Partial_SUM(price) AS sum$2, Partial_COUNT(id) AS count$3]) +- Calc(select=[name, id, amount, price], where=[>(id, 100)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])
